[15-SEC RE-HOOK]: But here's what Chris Linsell, a real estate tech analyst in Michigan, just told me changes everything.

INSIGHT: He said: "You can have AI do exactly what you were saying â€” start interpreting data in my local market." [ON-SCREEN: AI interprets YOUR market data] Not writing listing descriptions. Not social posts. Market interpretation. [ON-SCREEN: Feed ChatGPT your local data] Feed ChatGPT your last 90 days of sold comps, days on market, price trends. Then ask: "What pattern am I missing?" [ON-SCREEN: "What pattern am I missing?"] Or "Why are homes under $300K moving faster in zip code 48374?" [ON-SCREEN: Ask specific market questions] It spots the trend you've been staring past for months.
